item.title: Lift Every Voice And Sing - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Lift Every Voice and Sing by the Abyssinian Baptist Church. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C, F, A7, Dm, Bbdim, Dm, Gm, A, Bb, D, D7
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Joe Brown - Joe Brown - I'll See You In My Dreams - Jools Holland - 2008_UGC
item.description:
**NOT FOR BEGINNERS**
I'll See You In My Dreams by Joe Brown And The Bruvvers. For educational use. Chords Used: A7, Am, Bb, Bb6, Bb6-2, Bbm6, Bbmaj7, C, C7, Cm6, Cmaj7, D, D7, D7-2, D7(HI), D9, Dm, E7, E7-2, Edim, Em7, F, F/C, F6, F6-5, F7, Fmaj7, G7 (yes, this song uses 28 chords). The video is from YouTuber Elisa M. and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWERLNXIZGc. The chord progressions I used were heavily inspired by Jim’s Ukulele Songbook, which may be found at https://ozbcoz.com/Songs/downloadpdf.php?ID=3748%2Csongbook&fbclid=IwAR2UAs9814iikntmCk_pnDdsa9bE964sFKWluY5DTEEr4dIH5qDr2sdSB50 .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Mama Cass - Dream A Little Dream Of Me
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Dream A Little Dream Of Me - The Mamas & The Paps Music by Fabian Andre and Wilbur Schwandt and lyrics by Gus Kahn
Using the chords: A A7 Bm B7 C E7 F Fm F#m G7 Ab
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or DU DU DU DU
This is not an easy play along but with lots of practice it is very playable and devinitely worth the work.
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Christopher Davis-Shannon - Don't Call Me Honey
item.description:
For educational use. For GCEA Ukulele. Key of F, a whole step higher than the original version.
Chords Used: F, F7, Bb, Bbm6, C7, D7, G7, Bdim7, E7, A7, Bm
As performed by Christopher Davis-Shannon. Special thanks to him, as he gave me permission to use this song and also provided help with the chords shown . Incidentally, he plays the song "in C" but on a ukulele tuned up a minor third (i.e. Eb).
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE):
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Various Artists - The Window Cleaner
item.description:
Ukulele play along
When I'm Cleaning Windows - George Formby
Using the chords: A7 B7 C D D7 E7 G G7 Gdim7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU
Notes: The audio has been slightly lowered to make it easier to play
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Crowder - All My Hope
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G Am C D7 A7
All My Hope by David Crowder. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. item.title: Toon Tunes - The Flintstones
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C (Transposed down from the original).
Chords Used: G, C, Dm7, D7, G7, Dm, Em, F, E7, A7, Am7, Fm
The theme song from The Flintstones.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/SxhKRWp3zx0
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6

item.title: Mickey Mouse Ku’u Lei Melody Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. Transposed down a major third from the original. Suggestion: if you want to play along with the original song, consider using a capo at the 4th fret and using these chords.
Chords Used: C, Dm, G7, C7, F, Fm, A7, D7, E7
As heard in the Disney Short "Mickey Mouse Ku'u Lei Melody"
https://youtu.be/QDhdMF0qZI8
The song (PDF) was shared on social media by the composer (Christopher Willis) under the name "Pua Nani Ē."
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/A1OW_b1t3u0
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: The Beach Boys - I Can Hear Music
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Can Hear Music - The Beach Boys
Using the chords: A A7 D D7 Em F#m G Gm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU or DU DU DU DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Time for a Tune Up (The Joy of Gone) Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm & D.
Chords Used: Dm, C, Gm, A, A7, D, Bm, G
As featured on the Bagster Bag Commercial: https://youtu.be/MpBQBs-ggjg
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/3zTfJvlVu8o
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
